channel.title: Windows on ZySec
channel.description: Recent content in Windows on ZySec

item.title: Commando VM â€“ a PenTest distro for the windows users
item.author: zysec@pm.me (Mohammed Zanil)
item.description: For long, penetration testers and security enthusiasts have been using tools that are natively built around the linux platform. There are few linux flavours dedicated entirely for this purpose. BackTrack, Kali and Parrot OS are few among them. FireEye, a Cyber Security Solutions Provider, has released a new product which runs on top of the windows OS to install more than 140 tools including the most popular ones such as Nmap, Wireshark, Burp Suite, Mimikatz, Hashcat etc.

item.title: Linux Terminal on Windows 10
item.author: zysec@pm.me (Mohammed Zanil)
item.description: Have you ever been stuck with the windows operating system when you wanted to run some bash commands? Probably, you even downloaded some emulators to run your bash commands! Well, in windows 10, Microsoft has included a feature to allow you to install a Linux distro through the Microsoft Windows Store.
